quests.tips.chapter.title: Tips
quests.tips.welcome.title: Welcome!
quests.tips.welcome.subtitle: This will be a long journey.
quests.tips.welcome.desc: Thank you for installing the CreCra modpack. Follow the quests and discover a new world.
quests.tips.teams.title: Teams
quests.tips.teams.subtitle: Playing with friends is more fun!
quests.tips.teams.desc.line1: You can also open the teams menu from your inventory by clicking the button in the top-left corner next to the quests button.
quests.tips.teams.desc.line2: Click the Create a Party button to create your first team.
